net.java.jddac.common.util
Class GenericStore

java.lang.Object
  net.java.jddac.common.util.GenericStore
Direct Known Subclasses:
GenericArgArrayStore
public class GenericStore
extends java.lang.Object

Provides methods to access a pair of database tables. The database tables provide a named list of records, each with a parent pointer and a list of name/value pairs of attributes. Each record has a database ID which is used to access the records in an efficient manner.

The block is configured with a base database table name, which is used to access two tables: {basename} and {baseName}_attr. The tables should be created with the following sql statements. These statements will need to be adjusted based on which database provider is used and if indexes are needed. 

   CREATE TABLE {basename} (id INTEGER AUTO_INCREMENT UNIQUE, name VARCHAR UNIQUE, pid INTEGER);
   CREATE TABLE {basename}_attr (id INTEGER, name VARCHAR, value VARCHAR);

See Also:
GenericStoreBlock, GenericArgArrayStore

getAllByParent

public ArgArray getAllByParent(long parentId)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
Get an ArgArray of all records matching a parentId. The returned ArgArray contains an element for each matching record where the key is the name of the record and the value is the database ID of the record.

Parameters:
parentId - - the parent ID to match.
Returns:
an ArgArray of matching records.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - - if a database access error occurs

getAllByParentAttr

public ArgArray getAllByParentAttr(java.lang.String attrName,
                                   java.lang.String attrValue)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
Get an ArgArray of all records that have a parent that has a matching name/value attribute. The returned ArgArray contains an element for each matching record where the key is the name of the record and the value is the database ID of the record.

Note: This function requires the parentTableName parameter of the constructor to be set appropriately.

Parameters:
attrName - - the name of the parent's attribute to match.
attrValue - - the value of the parent's attribute to match.
Returns:
an ArgArray of matching records.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs
